attributes.action: Make Forces Pensions past & present TAX FREE
attributes.additional_details: It really is criminal that Forces Pension, past & Present are taxed!! WHY!!, The members of the Armed Forces work extremely hard over the years in order to get the Pension, then find it is heavily taxed by the Government. It is not a gift Mr M.P., its a pensionthat has been well earned, so how about making the Armed Forces Pensions Past & Present TAX FREE
